metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3572 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in python-pip in the way it handled Unicode separators in git references. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to install a different revision on a repository. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data integrity. This is fixed in python-pip version 21.1.

criterions.comment: python-pip package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
